package.description: The CSS Utility class includes tools for positioning, importing external stylesheets, and enabling and disabling stylesheets.

static-class.name: css
static-class.description: Utilities for DOM Styles and Cascading Style Sheets.

method.name: toggleStyleSheet
method.param: Bit indicating whether the stylesheet should be enabled.
method.description: Enables or disables the specified external stylesheet.

method.name: loadStyleSheet
method.param: Path to the external stylesheet. Default root path is Hemi.base_path.

method.name: getAbsoluteTop
method.return-value: The absolute top of the specified object from the parent window.
method.description: Returns the absolute top position of the specified node.

method.name: getAbsoluteLeft
method.return-value: The absolute left of the specified object from the parent window.
method.description: Returns the absolute left position of the specified node.

method.name: getAbsolutePosition
method.return-value: The absolute position of the specified object from the parent window.
method.description: Returns the absolute position of the specified node.

method.name: decodeJSON
method.description: Returns an object from the encoded construct. The accepted pattern is: {#HF_NAME{name:value}}, and the returned value is an object whose first member is NAME and whose children is the encoded data. For example: {#HF_Test{data:1}} would yield: {Test:{data:1}}, as a JavaScript object.
